akn:content.akn:p: A person need not register with the Director pursuant to ยง 1-1162.29 if the person is:

Any person who is exempt from registration under any provision of this section, except a person exempt from registration under the provisions of subsection (a)(1) of this section, may be a registrant for other purposes under this part; provided, that no activity engaged in by the person shall constitute a conflict of interest under the provisions of ยง 1-1162.23. Registrants have no obligation to report activities in furtherance of exempt activities under this section in activity reports required under ยง 1-1162.30.
